title: Dhaka Central Jail prisoner dies
body: A 75-year-old prisoner died after falling sick at Dhaka Central Jail Tuesday night, the authorities said. The deceased is Abdul Matin, son of late Mirjan Ali. Details about him are yet to be known. Prison officer Mirza Harun said Matin suddenly felt sick at night prompting them to rush him to Dhaka Medical College Hospital where physicians declared him dead at around 11:15pm upon arrival. Md Faruk, in-charge of the hospital police outpost, said that the body has been kept in the morgue for autopsy. The body will be handed over to the family after legal procedures.
